Title: Chief Compliance Officer, Yorkville Advisors Global, LP

Appointed By: Yorkville Advisors Global, LLC (in its capacity as General Partner)

Appointee: [Name of the appointee]

Date of Appointment: [Insert date]

Signature: Troy J. Rillo, Esq.

Revised Clause:

The appointee shall have the discretionary authority to implement and enforce compliance policies, procedures, and practices on behalf of Yorkville Advisors Global, LP (the "Fund"). However, the General Partner shall bear ultimate responsibility for ensuring compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and fund documents. Any deficiencies in compliance, as determined by regulatory authorities, shall be addressed by the General Partner, notwithstanding any actions taken or not taken by the Chief Compliance Officer.

In this revised clause, the Chief Compliance Officer still has authority to implement and enforce compliance policies but the ultimate responsibility for ensuring compliance with all applicable laws and regulations lies with the General Partner. This shifts some of the responsibility from the Chief Compliance Officer to the General Partner in case of any deficiencies found by regulatory authorities.

Title: Chief Compliance Officer for D-Beta One Growth and Opportunity Fund Offshore, LP By: D-Beta One GP, LP (General Partner), On behalf of: D-Beta One GP, LLC (General Partner) By: /s/ Troy J. Rillo, Esq., Date: 4/8/2020

Troy J. Rillo, Esq.

Rather than placing an obligation on the Chief Compliance Officer, this revised clause places a duty on the General Partner (D-Beta One GP, LP) to appoint a Chief Compliance Officer from D-Beta One GP, LLC (the entity that is the General Partner). This subtle change signifies a shift in the responsibility for compliance from an individual to a corporate entity.

Here's the original clause for reference:
Chief Compliance Officer D-Beta One Growth and Opportunity Fund Offshore, LP By:D-Beta One GP, LP Its:General Partner By:D-Beta One GP, LLC Its:General Partner By:/s/ Troy J. Rillo, Esq. Date: 4/8/2020 Troy J. Rillo, Esq.

In the original clause, the Chief Compliance Officer is to be appointed by D-Beta One GP, LP (the General Partner), from D-Beta One GP, LLC (the entity that acts as the General Partner). In this revised clause, however, it is the General Partner (D-Beta One GP, LP) who must appoint a Chief Compliance Officer from D-Beta One GP, LLC.

original: Chief Compliance Officer D-Beta One GP, LLC By:/s/ Troy J. Rillo, Esq. Date: 4/8/2020 Troy J. Rillo, Esq.
ollama_generated:
Chief Compliance Officer D-Beta One GP, LLC, by: /s/ Troy J. Rillo, Esq. Date: 4/8/2020

It shall be the responsibility of the Recipient (as defined below) to ensure, to the extent legally permissible and reasonably practicable, compliance with all applicable laws, rules, and regulations, as well as any internal policies or guidelines set forth by D-Beta One GP, LLC ("D-Beta"). Notwithstanding the foregoing, D-Beta shall not be held liable for any noncompliance caused by the Recipient's failure to comply with its obligations under this provision.

Recipient: Any person, entity or organization that receives, accesses or uses any materials, information, or services provided by D-Beta.
